oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigate when a product of t >= 2 terms taken from a set of k successive terms in arithmetic progression is a perfect square. Further, we study the Galois group of Laguerre polynomials. For this, we consider products, which are perfect squares and having terms from two blocks of arithmetic progression.
